data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for To Consider And Approve Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter & Nine Months Ended December 31 2025.
data.news_body: Accuracy Shipping Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 14/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter & nine months ended December 31 2025.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018 Please find attached copy of certificate received from MUFG Intime India Private Limited Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of the Company for the quarter ended on 31st December 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Crisil Ratings Limited has downgraded the credit rating assigned to the Companys long-term bank facilities aggregating to  Rs. 128 Crore from " CRISIL BBB-/Stable" to " CRISIL BB+/Stable"

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith Investor Presentation of the Company for the quarter & half year ended September 30 2025. This Information will also be made available on the website of the Company: www.aslindia.net.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith Investor Presentation of the Company for the quarter & half year ended September 30 2025. This Information will also be made available on the website of the Company: www.aslindia.net.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Newspaper Advertisement of the Financial Result of the Company for the quarter & half year ended 30th September 2025 published in Financial Express  (English) all India edition and Financial Express (Gujarati) today i.e. 15th November 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On Friday 14Th November 2025
data.news_body:
In reference to earlier communication dated 06th November 2025 we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Friday 14th November 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved the following:

  Standalone and Consolidated Un-Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter & half year ended 30th September 2025 pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On Friday 14Th November 2025
data.news_body: Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e 14th November 2025 has approved  standalone and consolidated Un-audited result for the quarter & half year ended 30th September 2025.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On Friday 14Th November 2025
data.news_body: Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e 14th November 2025 has approved  standalone and consolidated Un-audited result for the quarter & half year ended 30th September 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting To Be Held On 14Th November 2025 Under Regulation 29 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
Accuracy Shipping Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 14/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29 (1) (a) and other relevant clauses of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 notice is hereby given that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday 14th November 2025 inter alia

  To consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter & half year ended September 30 2025.

Further pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulation 2015 the trading window for dealing in the Securities of the Company shall remain closed for all the Specified persons/designated employees of the Company from October 01st 2025 till the expiry of 48 (Forty-Eight) hours from the date of submission of the Unaudited Financial results of the Company for the quarter & half year ended September 30 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Accuracy Shipping Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 06 2025 the Equity Shares of Accuracy Shipping Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544598) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251104-56 dated November 04 2025.

data.news_body: Accuracy Shipping Limited has informed the Exchange about Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018

data.news_body: Accuracy Shipping Limited has submitted the Exchange a copy Srutinizers report of  Annual General Meeting held on September 30, 2025
